robot

Class ObjectDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.ObjectDetector

  • public class ObjectDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    The object detector class is responsible for using the ultrasonic sensor and the light sensor to detect objects in front of the robot.
    Version:
    0.5

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ObjectDetector(Navigator navi, SampleProvider usSensor, float[] usData, SampleProvider colorSensor, float[] colorData, boolean AUTOSTART)
      Default constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double filter(double distance)
      This is a temporary placeholder method to filter the distance data.
      Navigator getNavi()
      This method allows outside classes to access the ObjectDetector's navigator.
      boolean[] getVisionStatus(boolean[] status)
      This method allows outside classes to get all the information from the objectDetector, whether an object was seen, whether its color was seen, etc.
      void timedOut()
      This method checks the sensor data whenever it is called.
      void updateNavi(double farDist, double closeDist)
      This method allows the object detector to tell the navigator the state of the field of vision.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ObjectDetector

        public ObjectDetector(Navigator navi,
                      SampleProvider usSensor,
                      float[] usData,
                      SampleProvider colorSensor,
                      float[] colorData,
                      boolean AUTOSTART)
        Default constructor
        Parameters:
        navi - the navigator
        usSensor - the SampleProvider for ultrasonic values
        usValue - the ultrasonic values from the SampleProvider
        colorSensor - the SampleProvider for color values
        colorValue - the color values from the SampleProvider.

    • Method Detail

      • timedOut

        public void timedOut()
        This method checks the sensor data whenever it is called. It also tells the navigator whether an object/flag was seen or not.

      • filter

        public double filter(double distance)
        This is a temporary placeholder method to filter the distance data.
        Parameters:
        distance - data fetched from the ultrasonic.

      • updateNavi

        public void updateNavi(double farDist,
                       double closeDist)
        This method allows the object detector to tell the navigator the state of the field of vision.
        Parameters:
        farDist - Distance within which the object detector will say an object has been detected
        closeDist - Distance within which the object detector will say an object is close

      • getVisionStatus

        public boolean[] getVisionStatus(boolean[] status)
        This method allows outside classes to get all the information from the objectDetector, whether an object was seen, whether its color was seen, etc.
        Parameters:
        status - the array of boolean values to be filled with the information requested.

      • getNavi

        public Navigator getNavi()
        This method allows outside classes to access the ObjectDetector's navigator.
        Returns:
        Navigator
